page.title: 09FEMALE FASHION SUMMER 1985
page.content: The female fashion in Summer 1985 is bat-winged tops which have bat-winged sleeves.Trousers are three-quarter length or ski-pants which are tight and have stirrups.Normally girls don't wear socks at around the age of thirteen.The female adults,who don't leave their feet uncovered,wear nylon tights.The children wear ankle-socks that come just above the ankle.The shoes are slip-on but sometimes are tied up with laces.The clothing on the upper part of the body has a 'V' at the back.The skirts are just above the knee or 'mini'.The jackets are short in the summer,when hot;if cold,a coat is worn that comes to the top of the calves.Jewellery consists of earrings, necklaces, rings and a watch. Hair is often short and 'permed'.Make-up colours are blue,pink and mauve;very colourful and attractive.
